name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】みんなありがとう！ぺこーらありがとうLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [L2y7a_zMi20]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Aki Rosenthal perform 'Sekai wa Koi ni Ochiteiru' in a 3D classroom setting.
Transition scene with a black screen leading into a large concert stage setup.
Usada Pekora and Hakui Koyori perform 'Happy Present' on a colorful concert stage with sports-themed decorations.

subtitles.original: 落ちている
subtitles.english: ...is falling in love.

subtitles.original: 光の矢胸を射す
subtitles.english: An arrow of light pierces my chest.

subtitles.original: 全部わかりたいんだよ
subtitles.english: I want to understand everything.

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Tell me.

subtitles.original: たった1ミリが遠くて
subtitles.english: Even just one millimeter feels so far.

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けた日々に
subtitles.english: In the days I've run through.

subtitles.original: 忘れない 忘れられない
subtitles.english: I won't forget, I can't forget.

subtitles.original: 輝く1ページ
subtitles.english: This one shining page.

subtitles.original: お似合いの二人に なんだか複雑な
subtitles.english: Looking at the perfect couple, I feel complicated.

subtitles.original: 気持ちがいるよ
subtitles.english: These feelings are here.

subtitles.original: 初めての感情 鼓動にリンクする
subtitles.english: This first-time emotion links to my heartbeat.

subtitles.original: 体温計 壊れちゃったかな?
subtitles.english: I wonder if the thermometer broke?

subtitles.original: 自分のことわからないまま
subtitles.english: Without even understanding myself.

subtitles.original: あの子にアドバイスまでしちゃって
subtitles.english: I even ended up giving advice to that girl.

subtitles.original: 胸が痛いや
subtitles.english: My chest hurts.

subtitles.original: 世界は恋に落ちている
subtitles.english: The world is falling in love.

subtitles.original: 光の矢胸を射す
subtitles.english: An arrow of light pierces my chest.

subtitles.original: 気付いたこの想いは もう遅いの
subtitles.english: Is it already too late for these feelings I've realized?

subtitles.original: あの子のほうが可愛いの 知ってるよ だけど
subtitles.english: I know she's cuter than me, but...

subtitles.original: うまくいくななんてね
subtitles.english: Hoping things don't go well for them...

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したいくせに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to run away.

subtitles.original: バカ。
subtitles.english: Stupid.

subtitles.original: 君のこと全部わかりたいって思っちゃう
subtitles.english: I end up thinking I want to understand everything about you.

subtitles.original: これが恋だって初めて気付いたの
subtitles.english: I realized for the first time that this is love.

subtitles.original: 絶対 振り向いてほしい
subtitles.english: I definitely want you to look my way.

subtitles.original: 遅かったけど諦めたくない
subtitles.english: It's late, but I don't want to give up.

subtitles.original: だって 好きだから
subtitles.english: Because... I love you.

subtitles.original: 本当に 咲いた 花が 恋をした
subtitles.english: A flower that truly bloomed fell in love.

subtitles.original: 花は 必死に 上を向いて 笑った
subtitles.english: The flower desperately looked up and smiled.

subtitles.original: 青い 夏の 蕾も 恋をした
subtitles.english: The blue summer bud also fell in love.

subtitles.original: 咲かない 花と 火薬の 匂い
subtitles.english: The flower that won't bloom and the smell of gunpowder.

subtitles.original: 本当の気持ち 言葉にして
subtitles.english: Putting my true feelings into words.

subtitles.original: 大事なこと話せたら
subtitles.english: If I could talk about what's important.

subtitles.original: 今日もリスタート
subtitles.english: Starting over again today.

subtitles.original: どんだけ鈍い君だから 口に出して言わなきゃ
subtitles.english: Since you're so dense, I have to say it out loud.

subtitles.original: 今君に伝えるよ ねえ 好きです
subtitles.english: I'm telling you right now. Hey, I love you.

subtitles.original: 世界は恋に落ちている
subtitles.english: The world is falling in love.

subtitles.original: 光の矢胸を射す
subtitles.english: An arrow of light pierces my chest.

subtitles.original: 全部わかりたいんだよ ねえ
subtitles.english: I want to understand everything, hey.

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Tell me.

subtitles.original: たぐり寄せて 0センチ
subtitles.english: Pulling it closer, zero centimeters.

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けた日々に
subtitles.english: In the days I've run through.

subtitles.original: 忘れない 忘れられない
subtitles.english: I won't forget, I can't forget.

subtitles.original: 輝く1ページ
subtitles.english: This one shining page.

subtitles.original: ハッピープレゼント
subtitles.english: Happy Present

subtitles.original: 黒板そっぽ向いて
subtitles.english: Facing away from the blackboard.

subtitles.original: ちらり見つめる先は
subtitles.english: The destination of my sidelong glances is...

subtitles.original: 甘い横顔ファンタジー
subtitles.english: ...the fantasy of your sweet profile.

subtitles.original: 突然校舎裏
subtitles.english: Suddenly behind the school building.

subtitles.original: そうだ恋愛モード
subtitles.english: That's right, romance mode.

subtitles.original: やっぱ私じゃない
subtitles.english: As I thought, it's not me.

subtitles.original: だけどあなた...
subtitles.english: But you...
